html:
12.17.19  8:22 am   who makes the rules? 

     anyone. you can. go ahead and make some

12.17.19  7:31 am   what should i request for christmas

     a snow plow

12.17.19  6:55 am   spoil me on your new video

     i absolutely will

12.17.19  6:08 am   How much butter do you use when cooking?

     i use a 6 by 3 inch slab, frozen, on the side, just to write down what i'm doing

12.17.19  5:55 am   why does it make you feel good to look at calendars?

     must be the days/weeks

12.17.19  5:36 am   Thoughts about ceilings?

     awesome. i love them. for christmas i am getting a ceiling

12.17.19  5:33 am   How can I hit the beast mode? 

     just do it on regular mode. that is what most of the beasts do

12.17.19  4:38 am   What should I take pictures of?

     other cameras

12.17.19  4:15 am   hi quick survey, are you ready 

     almost. for what

12.17.19  4:06 am   How did you find your passion?

     it usually ambushes me repeatedly throughout every minute of the day. but i'm still searching for it

12.17.19  3:46 am   I love the castle song from "ball & stick" so goddamn much. I don't think I've ever felt more passionate about a song. 

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

12.17.19  3:40 am   bless my soul

     i will try

12.17.19  3:28 am   What is plastic?

     it's like a protective wall that prevents biology from interacting with itself

12.17.19  3:28 am   I did a bad thing

     oh now i'm curious what it is

12.17.19  3:24 am   bill my friend gave me a travel journal because I keep journals (boring paper ones). Should I use it for a normal journal or should I save it for when I travel, which isn't happening in the foreseeable future? Would it bend the universe if I used a travel journal for something other than travel? I feel like it might not be 'correct'

     if you are trying to be 'correct' and 'not to bend the universe' in your journals, then i might be the wrong person to ask

12.17.19  2:44 am   what's the easiest instrument that i could start on

     light switch

12.17.19  2:23 am   Your music is kinda scary, the way it doesn't make sense reminds me of the loss of meaning and coherence in the world right now, where religions are loosing their influence and leave Modern Man without any sense of direction in life. Science makes crazy discoveries every day, giving us the power to destroy ourselves and the planet. Transhumanism is probably the most dangerous idea ever and will lead us further down this path. Who can save us, Bill?

     i will do it

12.17.19  2:22 am   how much have you amounted to so far

     this much

12.17.19  2:19 am   how much of a pile of questions do you have and does this fuel anxiety and/or creativity? questions personally give me purpose, so i appreciate having them.

     they are pretty good, but in this case i can't tell if you are talking about the questions i receive here, or questions i would like to ask

12.17.19  2:03 am   What was like the creative process of "hi, i'm steve"?

     steve is the poster child for "discovery writing" or "pantsing"

      Did you start writing it as a jingle way before and some years later randomly pick it and complete it?

     absolutely not

      Or did you just start and finish it in a couple sitting in few days? 

     the writing was done within 30 minutes, i'm sure

12.17.19  1:41 am   what do you think is the most ridiculous sounding instrument

     rocket ship

12.17.19  1:40 am   Why is my cat licking the window?

     taste it for yourself, and find out

12.17.19  1:13 am   do you get enough sleep these timestamps are making me nervous

     there's no need for the timestamps to make you nervous about me. the timestamps have nothing to do with me, that's when the questions were asked

12.17.19  12:59 am   How does one play music like you?

     i'm trying to demonstrate

12.17.19  12:15 am   cleaning gives me new focus on reality. is that what music is like for you?

     yes! but it's dirtier

12.16.19  11:39 pm   Im kinda nervous to ask a question soooo, whats 1 plus 1

     too much

12.16.19  11:29 pm   Why am I sick

     to remind you to get better

12.16.19  11:04 pm   what is five

     /////

12.16.19  10:59 pm   what are some ways that i can distract myself from excessive worrying

     walking, singing,

12.16.19  10:59 pm   Why is water water 

     because you said so

12.16.19  10:49 pm   Is time a real thing?

     yes

      Could any amount of time just be our minds tricking us?

     the trickery occurs at such a steady rate, it is measurably firm enough to be considered reality

      Is a minute an hour or an hour 30 minutes?

     no

      Could a life only be half of the time you're alive?

     yes, or double

      Also, what's your favorite color?

     that depends on what the other colors are

12.16.19  10:49 pm   How are you doing?

     good

      What are you planning for the holidays?

     try to amount to something

12.16.19  10:48 pm   do you think the earth is flat

     it was, but people keep stepping on it and now it's a little bent. still good though

12.16.19  10:48 pm   why do you like to do what you do

     if i succeeded at doing what i like to do

12.16.19  10:38 pm   Would you ever consider eating a taco?

     yes, or use it as a boat

12.16.19  10:22 pm   hi

i keep isolating myself from a lot of the internet and people on it, hoping to focus more on making things, etc. is this a good decision?

     yes, at least try it

      have a nice day.

12.16.19  9:58 pm   you how are you

     pretty good

12.16.19  9:35 pm   can you do a face reveal

     no way

12.16.19  9:33 pm   I'm lost and feel like my life has no real direction. Guess I'll take each day one at a time, but I'm scared of not knowing what's at the end.

     read/watch some biographies

12.16.19  9:29 pm   F//G//A//E//F
or
D//G//G#//A//E//D#//D
which one sounds better

     neither one sounds like anything yet

12.16.19  9:21 pm   if you like chocolate, would you make a guitar out of it?

     yes, but i would make the strings out of dental floss

12.16.19  9:19 pm   How does a Bill Wurtz create such a genius song out of pure idea and logic of "Steve." Maybe we should inherit your training.

     holy smokes, you are very friendly

12.16.19  9:06 pm   What's a Good Chord(tm)?

     how about this

12.16.19  8:59 pm   What singers are you listening to right now?

     i'm trying to listen to all of them, if possible

12.16.19  8:45 pm   I AM GROWING. sometimes i sit at the edge between my soon-to-be-discarded self and my renewed self, and i witness myself thinking things i will, by the next day, no longer believe.

     that makes sense

12.16.19  8:45 pm   i am crazy. then again, why would i want not to be?

     maybe if you are trying to get a bank loan

12.16.19  8:14 pm   What did the coast guard say. Tell me. Must know

     ok

12.16.19  8:01 pm   Is nothing truly nothing?

     it's supposed to be

      is it actually just the absence of something?

     yes

      or is it something that just looks like nothing?

      that would be what i call a nothing thing

12.16.19  7:30 pm   Which dimension are you from?

     (up, left, forward)

12.16.19  7:23 pm   are derivatives integral?

     no
